statements: DELETE FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM offers WHERE discount > 10.00 AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0);
DELETE FROM Offers WHERE location_id = 3 AND discount > 20;
DELETE FROM offers WHERE location_id = 3 AND offer_id = 10;
